artifact_consistency.summary: Artifacts present and internally consistent as Phase-4 seed materials.

details.schema_tasks: Contains target paths and required canonical fields for product schema promotion.
details.rule_tasks: Specifies `00_base_rule.yml` metadata fixes (severity, remediation_hint) and example rule updates.
details.evaluator_tasks: Defines adapter scaffolds under `strategy_e/adapters/` with evaluate(resource) contract and minimal test suggestions.
details.activation_outline: Provides deterministic sequencing and phasing (early/mid/late) aligned with unblock roadmap.
details.consolidated_briefing: Summarizes pilot recommendations and PR sizing guidance consistent with other Phase-4 artifacts.

remaining_pre_activation_blockers: Update `rule_specs/*/00_base_rule.yml` to include `severity` and `remediation_hint` across product rule sets
Implement product evaluator adapters under `strategy_e/adapters/` mapping `evaluate(resource)` -> `run_pipeline_on_text`
Add minimal unit tests and CI validations for adapters and promoted schemas
Assign owners for promoted schema and rule registry updates
notes: Phase-4 seeding artifacts are complete and deterministic. They provide a clear, actionable recipe to unblock activation, however activation remains blocked until the listed pre-activation tasks are implemented. All files were verified to be present under `ai_reports/` and to follow the deterministic conventions used in Phase-3 artifacts.
source_review: This closeout was produced by reading the Phase-4 seed artifacts and briefing files present in `ai_reports/`. No files outside `ai_reports/` were modified.
